Short: The business identifier(s) for the medication treatment

Short: Action to occur as part of plan cpl-3: Provide a reference or detail, not both

Short: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

Short: Results of the activity Binding: CarePlanActivityOutcome (example): Identifies the results of the activity.
Definition: Results of the activity Binding: CarePlanActivityOutcome (example): Identifies the results of the activity.

Short: Activity details defined in specific resource
Definition: Activity details defined in specific resource

Definition: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

Short: Appointment or CommunicationRequest or DeviceRequest or MedicationRequest or NutritionOrder or Task or ServiceRequest or VisionPrescription Binding: CarePlanActivityKind (required): Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.
Definition: Appointment or CommunicationRequest or DeviceRequest or MedicationRequest or NutritionOrder or Task or ServiceRequest or VisionPrescription Binding: CarePlanActivityKind (required): Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Short: Detail type of activity Binding: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT) (example): Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.
Definition: Detail type of activity Binding: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT) (example): Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

Short: Why activity should be done or why activity was prohibited Binding: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings (example): Identifies why a care plan activity is needed. Can include any health condition codes as well as such concepts as "general wellness", prophylaxis, surgical preparation, etc.
Definition: Why activity should be done or why activity was prohibited Binding: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings (example): Identifies why a care plan activity is needed. Can include any health condition codes as well as such concepts as "general wellness", prophylaxis, surgical preparation, etc.

Short: not-started or scheduled or in-progress or on-hold or completed or cancelled or stopped or unknown or entered-in-error Binding: CarePlanActivityStatus (required): Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.
Definition: not-started or scheduled or in-progress or on-hold or completed or cancelled or stopped or unknown or entered-in-error Binding: CarePlanActivityStatus (required): Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Short: If true, activity is prohibiting action
Definition: If true, activity is prohibiting action

Short: What is to be administered/supplied Binding: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes (example): A product supplied or administered as part of a care plan activity.
Definition: What is to be administered/supplied Binding: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes (example): A product supplied or administered as part of a care plan activity.

Short: Extra info describing activity to perform
